pageDescription: Learn about our history, mission, vision, and achievements

mainContent.title: Excellence in Engineering Education
mainContent.description: Founded in 1995, Engineering College has been at the forefront of technical education for over 25 years. We are committed to providing quality education and fostering innovation.
mainContent.mission: To impart quality technical education and prepare students for the challenges of the ever-evolving technological landscape.
mainContent.vision: To be a center of excellence in engineering education, research, and innovation, producing globally competitive professionals.

timeline.title: Foundation
timeline.description: Established with a vision to provide quality technical education.

timeline.title: First Batch Graduates
timeline.description: Successfully graduated first batch with 100% placement.

timeline.title: Research Center
timeline.description: Established advanced research center for technological innovation.

timeline.title: National Recognition
timeline.description: Received 'A+' grade from National Assessment & Accreditation Council.

timeline.title: International Collaborations
timeline.description: Partnered with international universities for academic exchange.

facilities.title: Modern Laboratories
facilities.description: State-of-the-art laboratories equipped with latest technology and tools.

facilities.title: Digital Library
facilities.description: Extensive digital library with access to international journals and research papers.

facilities.title: Sports Complex
facilities.description: Comprehensive sports facilities for overall development of students.

facilities.title: Hostel Facilities
facilities.description: Comfortable and secure accommodation for outstation students.
